name: Jump Shot Frenzy!
description:
Jump Shot Frenzy! is a Local multiplayer 2D minimalist party game that pits players against each other in platformer style arenas. Equipped with a gun, players must shoot each other to become the last one standing, however, the gun can only be triggered whilst the player is in the air. When players jump their characters will perform a front flip to rotating the aim direction of the gun. The game features customisable avatars.

##How to play##

**Controls**

##Keyboard and mouse

  • A and D to move horizontally
  • Space to Jump
  • Mouse Left click to shoot

##Xbox controller

  • Left stick to move horizontally
  • A to Jump
  • Right trigger (RT) to shoot

##Playstation controller

  • Left stick to move horizontally
  • X to Jump
  • Right trigger (R2) to shoot
